aboutpara: I am a seasoned Data Scientist with over a year of professional experience in the field. I hold a postgraduate degree in Biomedical Engineering (Computational Neuroscience) from the Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad, and a graduate degree in Electronic Instrumentation & Control Engineering. My expertise spans across a range of industries, including Retail, E-commerce, Finance, Telecom, and Insurance, where I have worked on both structured and unstructured data projects. In my free time, I am passionate about participating in machine learning competitions and playing chess. My interests lie in the areas of Predictive and Genarative Modeling, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, Information extraction from unstructured data, and Time Series Forecast. If you are interested in collaborating or discussing any related topics, please feel free to reach out to me at heeralallegha@gmail.com or visit my website at https://heeralal.in/. I look forward to connecting with you!

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
